content: knitted jacket for babies and children in drops babymerino the piece is worked top down with raglan sizes 0 - 4 years drops design pattern bm-128-by yarn group a **sizes** 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years child s height in cm 48/52 - 56/62 - 68/74 - 80/86 92 - 98/104 **materials** drops baby merino from garnstudio 100-150-150 150-150 g colour 22 light grey drops buttons no 503 5-5-5-5 6-6 items needles drops circular needle size 3 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge ** 24 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
